metadata.title: Raise Animals Codes (November 2025) - Free Gems, Candy & Corals
metadata.description: Here is the list of all new Raise Animals codes that will give you free gems, candy, corals, and other valuable rewards. Updated November 2025!
metadata.heading: Raise Animals Codes (November 2025)
metadata.introduction: Are you tired of growing pets in a garden game? Well, Raise Animals is a Roblox game all about the pets. Here, you catch animals from the wild, raise them in your garden by feeding them, and collect money from tourists who visit you. Get free gems, cash, candy, and corals with these active codes!

steps.title: Launch Raise Animals on Roblox
details: Open Roblox and search for 'Raise Animals'
Click to join the game and wait for it to load

steps.title: Open the Codes Menu
details: Once you're in the game, look for the Settings icon (usually a gear icon)
Click on the Settings icon to open the menu

steps.title: Find the Code Redemption Section
details: In the settings menu, look for a tab or button labeled 'Codes' or 'Redeem Code'
Click on it to open the code redemption interface

steps.title: Enter the Code
details: Click on the text input field
Type or paste one of the codes from the list above
Note: Codes are case-sensitive, so make sure to enter them exactly as shown

steps.title: Redeem Your Reward
details: If the code is valid, you'll see a success message and receive your reward instantly
Check your inventory or currency to confirm the rewards were added

tips: Case-Sensitive: Always enter codes exactly as shown above
Check Expiration: Codes may expire, so redeem them as soon as possible
One-Time Use: Each code can only be redeemed once per account
Copy Codes: Use the copy feature on this page to avoid typing errors
Stay Updated: Bookmark this page and check back regularly for new codes

gems: Buy premium animals and rare species
Speed up animal growth and breeding
spins: Spin the reward wheel for prizes
Get random gems, candy, or coral rewards

codeNotWorking: Make sure you haven't already redeemed this code
The code may have expired - check the last updated date above
Try copying the code directly from this page instead of typing it
cantFindCodesMenu: Make sure you're playing the official Raise Animals game
Try restarting the game if the menu isn't appearing
Check if the game has received an update that changed the UI
